image_generation: Generate images that are semantically related to a given text input.
visual_question_answering: Answer the question based on an image.
image_captioning: Describe the content of an image in words.
image_classification: Classify the image by assigning it to a specific label.
video_question_answering: Answer the question based on images(vides).
visual_dialog: Answer the question based on dialog.
phrase_grounding: Answer the question based on pointed location of the image.
